pages.text: $(item)怪异根茎$()在空手挖开长草的泥土时最为常见，偶尔也能在高草丛里面找到。$(p)$(info) 尽管$(item)怪异根茎$()尝起来味同“吃土”，但它们确实能拿来充饥。

$(item)Pyroberries$() are often found growing on $(item)Pyroberry Bushes$() in the desert.$(p)$(info) $(item)Pyroberry Bushes$() can be fertilized with $(item)Blaze Powder$().$(p)$(warning) Harvesting $(item)Pyroberries$() is a very finicky and delicate procedure which may result in your untimely expiration.
